title: Dashboard page
editNameRancherSuccess: Your Managed Rancher service name  has been updated.
editNameRancherError: An error has occurred. Please try again later.
generateAccesModalDescription: A temporary password will be generated for your Rancher. To view it, please click “Confirm”
createRancherDiscoveryMode: You are currently in Discovery mode. To finish creating your resource, you must activate your project.
createRancherInfoMessage: Your usage will be billed on an hourly basis, depending on the total number of vCPUs on each of the worker nodes in your Rancher downstream clusters, with at least 20 vCPUs charged.
createRancherDescription: You can manage multiple downstream clusters within this service.
createRancherServiceLevelDescription:
Both plans offer all the Rancher features. The OVHcloud Edition plan only supports self-managed nodes brought individually to create downstream clusters on OVHcloud Public Cloud.
The Standard plan is perfect for private, multi-cloud, or edge cloud uses. You can migrate to the Standard plan at any time.
createRancherVersionDescription:
This service is powered by SUSE Rancher. OVHcloud supports the latest versions of Rancher. We recommend using the latest version.
We apply security patches and provide new releases on a regular basis, in accordance with our software lifecycle policy.
createRancherError: An error has occurred creating your Managed Rancher Service.{{rancherCreationErrorMessage}}.
createRancherOVHCloudPlanDescription_3: Flexible billing models : Pay-as-you-go or Reserved Instances (charged per managed vCPU).
createRancherOVHCloudPlanDescription_4: Simplified deployment and management on OVHcloud infrastructure (Public Cloud, MKS, Bare Metal, etc.).
createRancherStandardPlanDescription_1: All features of the OVHcloud Edition plan included.
createRancherStandardPlanDescription_2: Multi-cloud and hybrid management : Ability to deploy and manage Kubernetes clusters wherever they are (any Public Cloud provider, on-premise, edge, etc.).
createNameModaleHelperInput: The service name must be between 3 and 63 characters, must start and end with lower-case alphanumeric characters (a to z and 0 to 9), and may include the following punctuation marks: ‘_’ ‘.’ and ‘-’.
generateAccessModalPasswordDescription: Copy this temporary password to log in to your Rancher. After logging in, you will be prompted to create a new password for security reasons.
updateOfferModalDescription: You are about to update your current solution to the {{availableServicePlan}} solution. You will be billed {{planPricing}} ex. VAT/hour per orchestrated vCPUs. The changes will take effect right away, and will have no impact on your downstream clusters or the data in your managed Rancher. Please confirm if you wish to continue.
updateOfferPending: Your solution upgrade has been processed. Please wait... This may take a few minutes.
upgradePlanDescription: Create or register downstream clusters on any Rancher-supported public cloud, or on an automatable private cloud (e.g., VMware vSphere), including scenarios supported by the OVHcloud Edition solution.
savingsPlanMessage: Take advantage of low monthly rates with Savings Plans — save money without sacrificing the flexibility to use instances whenever you need them.
createRancherOfferDescription: With at least 20 vCPUs charged per Rancher
egress_tooltip: These CIDRs list the output IP address ranges used by Rancher. You might need to whitelist these IP addresses to access your third-party platforms (e.g. API calls to provision resources).
badRequestSwitchPlan: An error has occurred changing the solution for your Managed Rancher Service. You are currently using drivers that are not compatible with the {{plan}} solution: {{drivers}}
savingsPlanUsage: If you already have one or more Savings Plans, the vCPUs in your downstream clusters are automatically included in your plan’s total vCPU count.
iamTemporaryAccessUnavailable: The “Generate your temporary access” feature is not available when IAM authentication is enabled. To change the password for the Admin user, please use the Rancher interface.
iam_tooltip_content: Enables Rancher to use the identities managed by OVHcloud IAM (Identity and Access Management) to control access to the service, avoiding manual user management.
iam_modal_activation_content_1: The OVHcloud IAM authentication feature allows Rancher to use OVHcloud IAM identities to manage access. As a result, users log in to Rancher via their OVHcloud IAM SSO account, simplifying and centralising access management.
iam_modal_activation_section_title: When enabling OVHcloud IAM authentication in Rancher:
iam_modal_activation_point_1: Local users will still be functional.
iam_modal_activation_point_2: You can then proceed to log in with your usual Rancher accounts.
iam_modal_activation_warning_text: If the admin password is regenerated while IAM authentication is enabled, this will temporarily disable the option to log in with the IAM root user. To fix this problem, you need to first log in as the local “admin” user, in order to regain access using the IAM root user.
iam_modal_deactivation_content: Disabling OVHcloud IAM authentication will restore local user access in Rancher.
iam_modal_deactivation_warning: Users will no longer be able to log in via their OVHcloud IAM accounts.
iam_authentication_enable_success_messag: Authentication via OVHcloud IAM has been enabled on the {{ rancherId }} Rancher.
iam_authentication_disable_success_messa: Authentication via OVHcloud IAM has been disabled on the {{ rancherId }} Rancher.
generateAccessModalIamWarning: If the admin password is regenerated while IAM authentication is enabled, this will temporarily disable the option to log in with the IAM root user.
generateAccessModalIamWarning2: To fix this problem, you need to first log in as the local “admin” user, in order to regain access using the IAM root user.
freeTrialBannerMessage: You benefit from a free credit: • {{amountOvhEdition}} for OVHcloud Edition (equivalent to 20 vCPUs for 1 month) • {{amountStandard}} for Standard (equivalent to 20 vCPUs for 1 month)
freeTrialBannerMessageLine1: You benefit from a free credit:
freeTrialBannerMessageLine2: {{amount}} for OVHcloud Edition (equivalent to 20 vCPUs for 1 month)
freeTrialBannerMessageLine3: {{amount}} for Standard (equivalent to 20 vCPUs for 1 month)
freeTrialDisclaimer: *Credit valid for ~1 month depending on your usage. Once the credit is exhausted, billing will automatically resume based on your consumption.
freeTrialVoucherBanner: You are currently benefiting from the trial offer on this service. Find the details of your available credit in your <l>Voucher</l> interface.
